idea:
Bluwage is a Mess chain Company. It is focused to solve the problem of unbranded Messes based everywhere in India.

Bluwage is solving problems of messes by converting a branded mess Bluwage.

The problem which is solving by Bluwage in unbranded messes is the problem faced by the customer like- Quality of Food, Rate of diet, Bad services of unbranded of messes, quality of water, connectivity of customer to the messes, etc.

The Tiffin Service is a major issue for the customer, To solve this problem Bluwage uses its online platform to connect to the customer to Bluwage Branded Messes and take end-to-end responsibility from Online Check to Check out. And Bluwage has its design of Tiffin to serve their customer.

Bluwage Premium Membership is for Mess service as well as Tiffin Service.

Bluwage have their own DE for each Bluwage branding messes. The Delivery DE has a responsibility to provide service on time to the delivery of Tiffin.
name: Bluwage

idea:
ADDPAY is the first of its Fintech startup in India that believes in reaching out to rural area customers and helps to provide city-like micro ATM, bill payments, and recharge to remote areas. Currently, no other fintech company is giving such services in rural areas.

With this vision, we have come up with an Online to Offline business model, where customers can get benefited.
name: ADDPAY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Entrepreneurial and driven Chief Executive with both start-up and corporate experience in all aspects of business development and management from operations, finance to marketing. Track record of driving productivity by leveraging technology and implementing innovative solutions. Proven fundraising and networking skills, building fruitful partnerships with stakeholders.
name: Aadesh Suryarao

idea: Suspire is a marketplace that exists to make a sustainable lifestyle more accessible and cultivate a community of people committed to changing the ways we consume, reducing waste and being more considerate of our environment. We onboard brands within India that fall under these verticals: apparel, accessories and cosmetics/beauty.
name: SUSPIRE INDIA ECOSYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are the makers of Poo de cologne pre-toilet spray. A pre-toilet spray is used before toileting to prevent toilet odors. This is a new category for the Indian market.
name: Essentially Happy Marketing

idea: WE ARE TRADING IN ALL ITEMS LIKE COVID RELATED ITEMS AS WELL AS OTHER ITEMS ALSO
name: ARPITA ENTERPRISES

idea: DNS Concrete LLP (Formally known as Nishka Enterprises) is one of the distinguished companies extremely indulged in manufacturing an extensive series of products such as PVC Cover Blocks, Concrete Cover Blocks, PVC Plug, PVC Tie Rod Cone & Spacers. These products “Nishka Cover Blocks” are developed by well-trained team in accordance with the set industry guidelines employing the best-grade material and advanced techniques. To satisfy our clients in most effective way, we are providing these products in numerous sizes and designs. Apart from this, one can avail these products from us at nominal prices within prearranged period of time.
name: DNS CONCRETE LLP

idea:
At Inaari we want to help build an equal world where woman have pain-free periods and no longer have to deal with diseases that are related to hormonal imbalance. A world where women are aligned with their inner cycles and energy.

We help menstruating women get rid of PMS symptoms & period cramps. We solve PCOS and other hormonal imbalance related issues with simple dietary and nutritional advice. And yes, weight loss for those who want it, as happy side-effect.

Women’s hormone cycles are aligned to their menstrual cycle. Their nutritional needs, productivity at work, how they feel about themselves and others are different during times of the month. Through Menstrual Cycle Awareness, we help women combat not just issues related to hormonal imbalance, but also help them to optimize other aspects of their lives such as productivity, sleep, mood, libido, etc. and also help them feel supercharged and energized.

The Inaari Mobile Application is driven by a women’s personal health data and aligned using our proprietary algorithms. It allows women to track the various phases of menstrual cycle and provides them personalized advice.
name: INAARI LIFE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
UNSKOOLER, Online Learning Platform, easily accessible, convenient, flexible and affordable in many ways. UNSKOOLER is the one point solution for Any Board Exams as well as any kind of competitive exam. It provides comprehensive wholesome Education to cater the need of students for better understanding of subject without leaving their comfort zone anytime and anywhere without any hindrance.

With the rapid increase of information and knowledge, the student must become a lifelong learner UNSKOOLER plays an important role in helping individuals in this regard. UNSKOOLER provides a comfortable Learning Environment which is equipped with centrally self-directed instructions.
name: UNSKOOLER EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
MEDICAM focuses on achieving global standards in providing digital imaging solutions to the medical world. Since its inception in 2001, the company has emphasized on enhancing its innovative strengths and manufacturing expertise.

A proven track record speaks for the fact that its focus didn’t shift even once.

Every year, MEDICAM’s product range is surprising the market pundits. The company’s technologies are putting thousands of patients at ease. Its cameras are helping doctors to create surgical breakthroughs in some the world’s most renowned medical institutions. The global associations are enabling us to harness top-of-the-line technology. And our ever-growing presence is giving our peers a reason to get back to their drawing boards.
Today, with a robust portfolio, MEDICAM has become one of the eminent names in the medical equipment industry. Moreover, with its cost-effective innovations like Dental Intra Oral camera range, OPD ENT Camera, USB Video Dermatoscope, Video Proctoscope USB, Video Laryngoscope USB, Video Otoscopeand various types of Industrial Video Borescopes, the company has been able to carve a niche for itself.
name: Medicam
